channel.title: Code First on .Net Programmer Incubator
channel.description: Recent content in Code First on .Net Programmer Incubator

item.title: Register form
item.description: In this article, we will create a custom registration form and add it to the application. Let’s Create a database first register form: Right-click on “Models” and move the mouse to the “Add” button, then a new window with many options appears, click “class…”. Enter a name for your new class and click “Add”. Edit new properties in the class file. Open the file “ApplicationDbContext.cs” in the “Data” folder and add Dbset the new class will just be created.
